nodes.text: The Dulok Village was a village on the Forest moon of Endor inhabited by the Pubam tribe of Duloks during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

The Dulok Village was located some distance east of Endor's Research Outpost, and was inhabited by the Pubam tribe of Duloks and other Dulok outcasts. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, a number of intrepid spacers explored the village, and one looted a Commander LD-1 from the location, despite the violent objections of the local villagers.
